game.name: 梦魇逃亡
game.shortDescription: Choice-driven, story-rich visual novel about memory loops and unreliable truths. As Chu-Ling, relive the same night, gather clues, and decide who to trust. Your choices branch 8 chapters toward multiple endings, gallery unlocks, and New-Game-Plus conveniences.
